title: 10 Nights
description: From virgin to courtesan in 10 nights? Was Leah even willing to consider it?After graduation, twenty-four-year-old Leah was determined that no man would destroy her plans for the future. Or so she thought. Her best laid plans and well-ordered life were turned head over heels after her best friend, Janie, invited her to a "coming-out" party.One look at Rhett and all previous thoughts went straight to hell. He made an unbelievable offer to her: "Give me 10 nights and I'll show you pleasure beyond your wildest dreams."Was this an invitation to paradise or would his request destroy her mind, body and soul?
author: Michelle Hughes
